Name: Caf√© Eijlders
Review Text: Such a beautiful and cosy place in Amsterdam. Highly recommended to pop in for a couple of beers, the staff is very friendly and the beer selection is great. You can even nibble on some bar snacks which were great.

Name: Caf√© Eijlders
Review Text: Great Cafe. Patrick and the bar staff are brilliant. Anouk, I hope that the spelling is correct, Patrick's wife, gets more beautiful with age. Not too many women have that gift. Their black cat who I called Sphinx but whose real name was Swing was one of the most beautiful cats I have ever seen.Proost.

Name: Caf√© Eijlders
Review Text: Comfy, cozy bar, super close to Leidseplein. Friendly service also. Great selection of beers too. Recommended.
